metadata.description: Presenting a thrilling, chilling blend of steampunk and Gothic horror, Lovecraft-ed with care!  What is the secret of Amberleigh's Quarterly Journal of Adventure and Esoterica? Is it just a harmless Victorian comic book, or do its stories of strange worlds, dark ceremonies and terrifying creatures hold a dire warning of real danger in our world?
metadata.name: Steam Lore: A Curious Publication
